com.stripe.stripeterminal

Class Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.stripeterminal.Reader

  • public class Reader
extends java.lang.Object
    The Reader is a representation of a physical reader device.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Float getBatteryLevel()
      Get the current battery level as a boxed float in the range [0, 1].
      DeviceType getDeviceType()
      Get the DeviceType of this reader
      java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
      Get the serial number of this reader
      java.lang.String getSoftwareVersion()
      Get the current software version on the reader, expressed as a string
      boolean isSimulated()
      Return whether this reader is simulated

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getBatteryLevel

        public java.lang.Float getBatteryLevel()
        Get the current battery level as a boxed float in the range [0, 1]. If the reader does not have a battery, or the battery level is unknown, this will return null.
        Returns:
        the current battery level

      • getDeviceType

        public DeviceType getDeviceType()
        Get the DeviceType of this reader
        Returns:
        the device type

      • getSerialNumber

        public java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
        Get the serial number of this reader
        Returns:
        the serial number

      • getSoftwareVersion

        public java.lang.String getSoftwareVersion()
        Get the current software version on the reader, expressed as a string

      • isSimulated

        public boolean isSimulated()
        Return whether this reader is simulated
